name: Messagenius
description:
Messagenius is the smart messaging tool available as a stand-alone app, or as an add-on feature that facilitates smart and safe remote communication of: colleagues in office or on-field, supervisors with the team, and top managers with workforce.  Using messagenius in the workplace will allow coworkers to exchange text and voice messages, positions, and media.

Our main features are: Company’s contact Auto-syncing, integration with the company’s software and developing a communication management dashboard. Messagenius adapts to your work values, and mission, by integrating with the company’s software Messagenius offers special features  for users such as broadcast messages, message priority, or special alerts. 

We believe in maximizing productivity, that is why messaginius offers shortcuts and user-friendly interface. Messagenius cares about your data; hence, all of the communications amongst colleagues are kept safe in the company’s server, no infringement of GDPR.

team.name: Luigi Fidelio
team.bioHtml: Founder @Messagenius • Worked at @LUISS ENLABS, @LUISS Ufficio Stampa • Studied at @Luiss University, @Universidad De Belgrano

team.name: Simone Giacco
team.bioHtml: CTO with knowledge of marketing, business, finance and UX

team.name: Chiara Giordano
team.bioHtml: Co-Founder @Messagenius Creative, perfectionist and very keen about user experience. I'm determined and meticulous in improving UX, creativity and quality

team.title: Marketing
team.name: Francesca Ruvolo
team.bioHtml: A creative marketing and communication specialist, Her work is a combination between education, work experiences and passion for foreign languages (she knows 4)

jobs.title: ANDROID DEVELOPER - [Rome, ITALY, accommodation provided]
jobs.description:
VMS ME, startup selected by the TIM #WCAP Accelerator of Telecom Italia, has open positions for Android-Java Developers to develop and fine-tune the best voice messaging technology.

Offer

 - Full time job with flexible schedule (part-time is considered only for limited periods).
 - Salary + bonus for long-term goals + possible bonus in company’s shares
 - Young and exciting working environment, in the heart of Rome (Trastevere).
 - Accommodation provided for foreigners.

Skills

 - Java
 - Push notifications
 - Resource optimization to “lighten” apps
 - Parsing XML
Important: mobile development alternatives (HTML5, PhoneGap, Titanium, etc) are excluded
